posts.name: Anne T. Dotes
posts.description:
DESCRIPTION
Anne T. Dotes Concealer is a clean, stealth, skin perfectionist. Finally making her debut, this adorable, 100% recyclable tin makes this little lady extremely desirable. Not to mention, her ability to conceal redness, discoloration, and under-eye circles is un’can’ny. Loaded with good-for-your-skin ingredients like Organic Jojoba and Sunflower Oils, this remedy is always at your fingertips ready to assist. Available in 10 gorgeous shades.

Our Shade Match Guarantee:

Anne T. Dotes promises more than just skin-perfecting coverage, she wants to make sure you have the perfect shade and she won’t stop until you do! Live Chat or email us your clean-faced selfie and we’ll recommend the right shade. Still not a perfect match at home? Anne T. Dotes to the rescue – contact us and we’ll replace it with the right one. See our return policy for more details.

posts.name: THEBALMINA
posts.description: Congratulations, It’s a Palette! This newbie palette delivers everything you need with the best of theBalm! You may think octuplet girls are a handful, but these 8 shades of theBalmbina give you ample coverage. This all-inclusive, pretty little lady is full of our clean and green must haves. As no two little ones are alike, this breaks down to 4 blendable eyeshadows, two stunning blushes, a matte bronzer, and our newest highlight shimmer, Let’s Bolt. Each powder is versatile and can be used anywhere on your face, so get ready to light up your life.
